metadata.title: CVE-2024-6345 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in the package_index module of pypa/setuptools versions upto 69.1.1 allows for remote code execution via its download functions.These functions, which are used to download packages from URLs provided byusers or retrieved from package index servers, are susceptible to codeinjection. If these functions are exposed to user-controlled inputs, suchas package URLs, they can execute arbitrary commands on the system. Theissue is fixed in version 70.0.

criterions.comment: python-setuptools package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
python-pip package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
